This page is about me

My name is Grace Hopper

I work in the NAVY as a programmer

For fun, I research how to write new machine programs

My favorite movie is "Hamlet"

My favorite type of music is jazz

In ten years I hope to be creating more complex programs that help the Navy

We love ScriptEd

ScriptEd equips students with the fundamental coding skills and professional experiences that together create access to careers in technology.

This year in ScriptEd we are going to create several websites, games and webapps!

In ScriptEd we learn...

  • HTML
  • CSS
  • JavaScript
  • Git
  • jQuery
